input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product title.

Product title:
Photo Background Paper Graduated, Black to Neutral Gray, 31 Inches Wide x 43 Inches Long, Ultra Smooth Non-Reflective Plastic Film for Product Photography - This Product is NOT Returnable

Product keywords:
Ideal for product presentation
Non-glare, matte finish, cleanable
For cleaning, use mild detergent only
Printed on white plastic film for ultra smooth, crease-resistant sweep
All photography backgrounds (with the exception of the lighter fabric chroma key Muslin backgrounds) shipped to Canada are subject to a brokerage and customs fee determined at the Canadian customs, which can be substantial
All photo background paper is not returnable

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This graduated, black to neutral gray, background paper is the perfect choice for product photography. The non-reflective matte finish on this backdrop allows for the photographer to achieve a professional look without the worry of unwanted reflections. It is also cleanable, making it a great choice for long-term use. This product is not returnable.
input_text.Response B: This black to neutral gray graduated photo background paper is ideal for creating a professional-looking, non-glare background for product photography or presentations. The ultra-smooth, non-reflective plastic film has a matte finish that can be easily cleaned with a mild detergent. This background paper measures 31 inches wide by 43 inches long, and is printed on white plastic film for an ultra-smooth, crease-resistant sweep. Background paper is non-returnable.
